FuncDef: This command enables the sending of ARP or ND packets on the wlan-gw GRE tunnel upon certain events. The target IP address in the ARP/ND packet is the endpoint IP address of the AP. The ARP/ND response from the AP should contain the AP MAC, which subsequently can be reported in called-station-id. When enabled this is sent for following events:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that authentication is delayed until the ARP/ND is answered or timed out, after which the AP-MAC can be included in authentication.
